item.description:
Dear Friends:

Gentleman please place yourself on waiting list. Last minute cancelations. We may need men. We acheived women quota. Thank you. We want to be close to a 50-50 balance.

This meetup group is for single individuals.(30-65)

The mission is to have fun and meet other single people with common interests. Develop friendships and possibly find a lifetime partner.

Values: Be nice, kind, cheerful, friendly and respectful to everyone.

Please invite other eligible single people.

The synergistic efforts of everyone will make it truly a memorable party.

***The entry fee is $10.00 plus food assignment.
I will give food and wine assignments three days prior to party.

Organizer/Host - Richard Tosti

Location is in a warm, loving, supporitve and relaxing environment of my home.
"Dress code - " summer dress, shorts or blouse/shirt. What ever is comfortable.
First impressions are most meaningful.
7:00PM - 10:00pm
Sat. August 14th, 2010

Maximum attendees 45

Location and Directions
My Home
36 Woodridge Road
Westwood, MA
781-551-3307

128-Exit 16B/Route 109 toward Westwood
Go 2 miles left on Pond Street- just past the middle school on left-if you go by Dunkin Donuts on right you missed it.
Go I mile left on Oak St.
Go 1.5 miles to end-right on Brook St.
100 feet take a right on Woodridge Road
My home is the 3rd house on the left-cream colored- number 36 Woodridge, Westwood, MA

See you on Saturday, August 14th at 7:00pm----

The best is yet to be!
Richard Tosti

Next home party August 28th to be scheduled soon
item.how_to_find_us: Welcome you at the door with a Sincere, Friendly Smile!
item.name: Singles Home Party
